name: Racey Track
description:
Racey Track - Fun Block Car Racing

24 Track, Over 30 Cars. Single Touch Game Play. Action Packed and Awesome.

Top Game Features:
--24 Ultra Challenging Race Courses
--Blocky style graphics
--Single touch game play
--30 Vehicles to unlock
--5 Unique environments

--Road Traffic and Pedestrians

Blocky cars include : Jeep, Tanks, Ice Cream Truck, Stretch Limo, Hummer, Ambulance, Firetruck, Garbage Truck, F1 track Race car, turbo bat car, drift specialty car, and many other blocky cars and trucks.


Environments include : Working Airport, Farm, Snow City, Big City, and Island Town.

Its a smashy, happy, all wheel fun game that you won't want to miss.
